options.name: -c
options.tip: read hashsums from the FILEs and check them

options.name: -q
options.tip: don't print OK for each successfully verified file

options.name: -s
options.tip: don't output anything, status code shows success

options.name: --strict
options.tip: exit non-zero for improperly formatted checksum lines

options.name: --ignore-missing
options.tip: don't fail or report status for missing files

options.name: -w
options.tip: warn about improperly formatted checksum lines

options.name: -z
options.tip: end each output line with NUL, not newline
